remarks: Lemma for ~ cnfcom .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2015.) (Revised by AV, 3-Jul-2019.)
statement:
cnfcom.s $e |- S = dom ( _om CNF A ) $.
cnfcom.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. On ) $.
cnfcom.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. ( _om ^o A ) ) $.
cnfcom.f $e |- F = ( `' ( _om CNF A ) ` B ) $.
cnfcom.g $e |- G = OrdIso ( _E , ( F supp (/) ) ) $.
cnfcom.h $e |- H = seqom ( ( k e. _V , z e. _V |-> ( M +o z ) ) , (/) ) $.
cnfcom.t $e |- T = seqom ( ( k e. _V , f e. _V |-> K ) , (/) ) $.
cnfcom.m $e |- M = ( ( _om ^o ( G ` k ) ) .o ( F ` ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
cnfcom.k $e |- K = ( ( x e. M |-> ( dom f +o x ) ) u. `' ( x e. dom f |-> ( M +o x ) ) ) $.
cnfcom.1 $e |- ( ph -> I e. dom G ) $.
cnfcom.2 $e |- ( ph -> O e. ( _om ^o ( G ` I ) ) ) $.
cnfcom.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( T ` I ) : ( H ` I ) -1-1-onto-> O ) $.
cnfcomlem $p |- ( ph -> ( T ` suc I ) : ( H ` suc I ) -1-1-onto-> ( ( _om ^o ( G ` I ) ) .o ( F ` ( G ` I ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k x z $.
$d F f k x z $.
$d G f k x z $.
$d H f x $.
$d I k x z $.
$d M x $.
$d S k z $.
$d T z $.
